thread.title: RUMOURS: Pepe offered massive China move
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Pepe offered massive China move

title: RUMOURS: Pepe offered massive China move
text:
0 04-Jan-2017 12:57:20 The Portugal star is out of contract in the summer and has been linked with a move to Manchester United, but now has offers from the Chinese Super League 
Real Madrid centre-back Pepe has been offered a deal worth â‚¬15 million per year to join Chinese Super League side Hebei Fortune, reports Calcio Mercato. 
The Portugal defender has been linked with a move to Manchester United in the summer, a switch that would reunite the 33-year-old with countryman and former Madrid boss Jose Mourinho. 
Juventus are also said to be interested in Pepe, though he may stay in the Spanish capital should he be offered the two-year deal he is asking for.
